body_html: If nothing else, I'd like to make an effort to get this into contrib. I have a working ConvLSTM and ConvGRU (with optional layernorm) here that works with 2D, 3D and 4D. Would just need to get it into the coding style of TensorFlow (e.g. qualified imports), add the deprecated stuff for backwards compatibility and make it NHWC/NCHW agnostic.
body_text: If nothing else, I'd like to make an effort to get this into contrib. I have a working ConvLSTM and ConvGRU (with optional layernorm) here that works with 2D, 3D and 4D. Would just need to get it into the coding style of TensorFlow (e.g. qualified imports), add the deprecated stuff for backwards compatibility and make it NHWC/NCHW agnostic.
body: If nothing else, I'd like to make an effort to get this into contrib. I have a working ConvLSTM and ConvGRU (with optional layernorm) [here](https://github.com/carlthome/tensorflow-convlstm-cell) that works with 2D, 3D and 4D. Would just need to get it into the coding style of TensorFlow (e.g. qualified imports), add the deprecated stuff for backwards compatibility and make it NHWC/NCHW agnostic.
